name: Undivided (S-Cov)
description:
-- CONTROLS --

WASD / Arrow Keys - move

Enter - select

Z - undo

R - restart

Esc - pause

-- MECHANICS --

You are an orange set of blocks that moves around together. If one block hits a wall, it gets stuck and doesn't move. If moving in a certain direction breaks the set of blocks, you can't move in that direction. You'll get the hang of it while playing.

This is a puzzle game made for Lowerezjam 2020, with the restriction of it having to be 64x64 or less. It was made in about 2 weeks and has 20 levels, as well as 3 mechanics.
